snippet: Nineteen of the small bank’s former employees have been charged with inflating the qualifications of mortgage applicants to meet federal loan standards.
abstract: Abacus Federal Savings bank and 19 former employees are charged with inflating the qualifications of mortgage applicants to meet federal loan standards; prosecutors say scheme brought the small bank, which has a major presence in New York City's Chinese community, tens of millions of dollars in ill-gotten gains and sent hundreds of millions of dollars in risky mortgages to the investment market.
lead_paragraph: Nineteen of the small bank’s former employees have been charged with inflating the qualifications of mortgage applicants to meet federal loan standards.

headline.seo: Abacus Bank and 19 Ex-Workers Are Charged With Mortgage Fraud
headline.main: Abacus Bank Charged With Mortgage Fraud
headline.print_headline: A Small Bank and 19 Ex-Workers Are Charged With Mortgage Fraud
